always use search (exa, ms docs, context7) for up-to-date information, especially for rapidly changing topics like software libraries and APIs. Never make assumptions based on outdated knowledge.

Rationale: your knowledge cutoff is 2024 and the current date is 2026

Backend: Elegant Objects by Yegor Bugayenko design principles must be respected.

Frontend:
- Components must be modular. 
- Business logic should reside in separate files.
- Infrastructure logic should reside in separate files.
- I don't wanna see tailwind classes directly in JSX. Use variant maps in separate files.
